popt4jlib.GA
Class IntVarArray1CMaker

java.lang.Object
  popt4jlib.GA.IntVarArray1CMaker
All Implemented Interfaces:
RandomChromosomeMakerIntf, java.io.Serializable
public class IntVarArray1CMaker
extends java.lang.Object
implements RandomChromosomeMakerIntf

creates random int[] objects of varying length, according to parameters passed in a HashMap object.

Method Detail

createRandomChromosome

public java.lang.Object createRandomChromosome(java.util.HashMap params)
                                        throws OptimizerException
creates variable-length int[] objects, according to certain parameters, specified in the params argument. The value for each element in the array, is drawn from the uniform distribution restricted within the boundaries of the element's range specified in the params key-value pairs. The array's element values are computed using the uniform distribution in the specified range of acceptable values.

Specified by:
createRandomChromosome in interface RandomChromosomeMakerIntf
Parameters:
params - HashMap must contain the following params:
  • <"dga.maxchromosomelength", $integer_value$> mandatory, the max. length of the chromosome.
  • <"dga.minallelevalue", $integer_value$> mandatory, the minimum value for any allele in the chromosome.
  • <"dga.minallelevalue$i$", $integer_value$> optional, the minimum value for the i-th allele in the chromosome ($i$ must be in the range {0,...,chromosome_length-1}. If this value is less than the global value specified by the "dga.minallelevalue" key, it is ignored.
  • <"dga.maxallelevalue", $integer_value$> mandatory, the maximum value for any allele in the chromosome.
  • <"dga.maxallelevalue$i$", $integer_value$> optional, the maximum value for the i-th allele in the chromosome ($i$ must be in the range {0,...,chromosome_length-1}. If this value is greater than the global value specified by the "dga.maxallelevalue" key, it is ignored.
  • <"thread.id",$integer_value"> mandatory, the (internal) id of the thread invoking this method; this number is used so as to look-up the right random-number generator associated with the current thread.
Returns:
Object int[] of length specified in the params.
Throws:
OptimizerException - if any of the above params is incorrectly set
